subject: $59.95 Adobe Dreamweaver
body:
The way to get things done is not to mind who gets the credit for doing them.

The sun shineth upon the dunghill, and is not corrupted.

Nothing more detestable does the earth produce than an ungrateful man.

Life is the art of being well deceived.

Things have never been more like the way they are today in history.

The only discipline that last is self discipline.

A life is like a tree -- if you don't make it straight when its young and green, you'll never do it when it's old and dry.

A computer won't clean up the errors in your manual of procedures.

If you're already in a hole, it's no use to continue digging.

How can one better magnify the Almighty than by sniggering with him at his little jokes, particularly the poorer ones.

Help others achieve their dreams and you will achieve yours.

That man's the true Conservative who lops the moldered branch away.

Baseball is ninety percent mental. The other half if physical
